PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE: id="${CONTROL_ID}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" >
id="${CONTROL_ID}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" >

<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
datarule="${DATA_RULE}" <#if MAX_LENGTH?? >maxlength="${MAX_LENGTH}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if COMP_MAX_VALUE?? >max="${COMP_MAX_VALUE}" <#if COMP_MIN_VALUE?? >min="${COMP_MIN_VALUE}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:input name="COMPANY_NAME" allowblank="false" auth_type="readonly" 
      value="${sysUser.COMPANY_NAME}" 
      datarule="required;"  
      
      label_value="所在单位"
      placeholder="请输入所在单位"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      
   >
   </plattag:input>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:radio name="SYSUSER_SEX" allowblank="true" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_SEX}" select_first="true" is_horizontal="true"
      label_value="性别"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      static_values="男:1,女:-1"
      
   >
   </plattag:radio>
